AfflictionHusk.name: Husk infection
AfflictionHusk.description: Something dark and unpleasant moves in the mouth. They are rendered completely mute, save for occasional clicking sounds apparently emanating from deep within the throat.
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been taken over by an instance of Velonaceps Calyx.

Affliction.name: Internal Explosion
Affliction.description: The patient's organs have been turned to mush
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: Your organs were blown to pieces.

Affliction.name: Frosine poisoning
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of frosine poisoning.

Afflictionhusk.name: Facehugged
Afflictionhusk.description: There's some kind of creature on their face.

Affliction.name: Chestburster Embryo
Affliction.description: You have a Xenomorph chestburster gestation happening. Fix it.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: A chestbursted has been born out of your body.

Affliction.name: Xeno Growth
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have grown to something more.
